DOC.brief_summary: To assess effect vaginal estradiol pretreatment vaginal misoprostol labor induction .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Estradiol Pretreatment Labour Induction With Misoprostol
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective double blind randomized clinical trial . Conducted Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Patients fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion divide two group . Group ( A ) : 100 patient receive single dose vaginal estradiol 50mcg tablet ( Ethinyl Estradiol manufacture KAHIRA Pharmaceutical company ) vaginal misoprostol 25mcg tablet ( Vagiprost manufacture ADWIA Pharmaceutical company ) , misoprostol alone repeat every 6hours five dos . Group ( B ) : 100 patient receive placebo vaginally misoprostol 25 mcg repeat every 6 hour five dos . Primary Outcome - Measure time cervical ripening . Secondary Outcome - Measure time active labor . - Number misoprostol dos . - Induction delivery time . - Time achieve vaginal delivery . - Fetal outcome ( Apgar score ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Maternal age ≥ 18 year old . Gestational age ≥ 37 wks 41 wks . BMI 20 kg/m2 35kg/m2 . Vertex presentation . Singleton pregnancy . Exclusion criterion : Multiple pregnancy . Non vertex presentation . Absolute relative contraindication vaginal delivery e.g . ( Placenta previa , fibroid uterus , uterine anomaly , previous uterine surgery ) . PROM . IUFD . Fetal distress .
